dcterms:creator: A. Reece
G. Cooney
P. Bull
C. Chung
B. Dawson
C. Fitzpatrick

dcterms:description: CANDOR is a large multimodal dataset of naturalistic conversations, consisting of 1,656 conversations in English with a total duration of over 850 hours, including more than 7 million words, enabling detailed moment-to-moment analysis of vocal and facial expressions as well as semantic and conversational contexts.
dcterms:title: CANDOR

dcterms:creator: M. Zhou
Y. Bai
W. Zhang
T. Zhao
T. Mei
dcterms:description: ViCo is a dataset consisting of 483 video sequences featuring 50 unique listeners, designed for evaluating responsive listening head generation.
dcterms:title: ViCo

dcterms:creator: E. Ng
S. Subramanian
D. Klein
A. Kanazawa
T. Darrell
S. Ginosar
dcterms:description: LM_Listener is an extended version of the dataset introduced in Learning2Listen, containing 2366 training segments, 222 validation segments, and 543 test segments of a single listener (Trevor Noah).
dcterms:title: LM_Listener

dcterms:creator: G. Fanelli
J. Gall
H. Romsdorfer
T. Weise
L. Van Gool
dcterms:description: BiWi is a 3D audio-visual corpus of affective communication, featuring recordings from 14 participants instructed to read 40 sentences in English, recorded at a frame rate of 25 frames per second.
dcterms:title: BiWi
